achievements: Considered one of the most influential figures in Western music history.
Bridged the Classical and Romantic periods.
Composed iconic works like symphonies, piano sonatas, concertos, and string quartets.
One of the most important philosophers of the 20th century.
Made significant contributions to logic, language, and the philosophy of mind.
Known for his patronage of the arts and architecture.
Commissioned the construction of Neuschwanstein Castle and other fairytale-like palaces.
